Is it likely that this election used Approval Voting?

It is likely that this election used Approval Voting, as it is a common method for electing a single winner in which voters can indicate their approval of multiple candidates. In Approval Voting, the voter does not have to specify which candidate is their first, second or third choice. Instead, the voter can simply approve of a candidate by marking a "yes" next to their name on the ballot. This method makes it easier for voters to make their voices heard while still allowing them to express their preferences.
